meanings.definition: A book or electronic device used to keep track of appointments and important dates.
meanings.sent1: My datebook helps me remember all my appointments.
meanings.sent2: I always carry my datebook to stay organized.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally left my datebook at home and missed my dentist appointment!
meanings.sent4: Her datebook is like a treasure map guiding her through the week.
meanings.sent5: The datebook is my lifeline, ensuring I never forget important dates.

meanings.definition: A calendar or planner used to organize schedules and events.
meanings.sent1: The datebook on my phone keeps me on schedule.
meanings.sent2: She flipped through her datebook to find the next meeting.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat my lunch off the datebook, mistaking it for a plate!
meanings.sent4: His datebook is a well-oiled machine, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The datebook is the conductor of my daily symphony, orchestrating each event seamlessly.
